steps.name: I have an authorization token
In the market exist DIS,VXX
I call the quotes with DIS,VXX
I receive a list with only the called symbols
I have an authorization token
I post quotes with symbols: AAPL,VXX
I receive a list with only the called symbols
I have an authorization token

elements.name: Obtain quotes with an option chain

steps.name: I have an option chain of VXX with expiration date: 2019-09-20
I call quotes with symbol: VXX expiration date: 2019-09-20
I receive quotes related to the symbol with the expiration date only
I have an authorization token

elements.name: Obtain quotes of options strikes prices

steps.name: I have an option strikes of DIS with expiration date: 2019-09-20
I call the options strikes with the symbol: DIS expiration date: 2019-09-20
I receive the strikes related to the symbol with the expiration date only
I have an authorization token

elements.name: Obtain the expiration dates of an option

steps.name: The VXX exist in the market with 2019-09-06
I call the options expiration with VXX
I receive expiration dates including 2019-09-06
I have an authorization token
In the market there is a AC with a transaction on the date 2019-01-02
I call the historical with AC
I receive the historical pricing related to the symbol
I have an authorization token

elements.name: Obtain time sales information of a specific symbol

steps.name: I call the time sales with symbol: AC
I receive time sales information of the current day related to the symbol
I have an authorization token
I call the clock
I receive information about the current day status
I have an authorization token
There exist content related to alphabet
I call a query for q: alphabet
I receive information of the searched company
I have an authorization token
There are symbols related with goog
I call the symbol for q: goog
I receive information about the searched symbol
I have an authorization token

elements.name: Obtain market information of a month

steps.name: I want the calendar of 3 of 2019
I call the calendar with the 3 of the 2019
I receive information about the month status

name: Market data
description: The API shows different information about Market Data

elements.name: Obtain all watchlist of a user

steps.name: I have a watchlist with name: default
